description: This file contains Cypress end-to-end tests verifying the captcha image visibility behavior in the UCC Portal, including its toggling on focus, blur, and when input has value.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a group of Cypress tests related to captcha visibility behaviors.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the test environment by visiting the root page before each test.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines an individual test case for toggling captcha image visibility based on input focus and value.
